factoid: The Military Governor was the subject of a question at the other side of the room.
The Military Governor is described as young-looking.
The Military Governor is over sixty years old.
The Count no longer recognizes anyone.
They wished to administer the sacrament of unction.
Someone received the sacrament of unction seven times.
The second princess came from the sickroom with red eyes from weeping.
The second princess sat beside Dr. Lorrain.
Dr. Lorrain was sitting in a graceful pose under a portrait of Catherine, leaning his elbow on a table.
Dr. Lorrain said 'Beautiful' in response to a remark about the weather.
Dr. Lorrain said the weather is beautiful and that in Moscow one feels as if one were in the country.
The princess replied 'Yes, indeed' with a sigh.
The princess asked whether he may have something to drink.
Dr. Lorrain considered the question.
Dr. Lorrain asked whether he has taken his medicine.
He has taken his medicine.
Dr. Lorrain glanced at his watch.
Dr. Lorrain instructed to take a glass of boiled water and put a pinch of cream of tartar.
The German doctor told the aide-de-camp that one lives after the stroke.
The aide-de-camp remarked that the man was well-preserved.
The aide-de-camp asked who will inherit the man's wealth.
The German doctor replied that the man will not go begging.
The second princess entered the room with a drink prepared according to Dr. Lorrain's instructions.
The German doctor approached Dr. Lorrain.
The German doctor asked Dr. Lorrain whether he can last till morning.
Dr. Lorrain pursed his lips and waved a severely negative finger before his nose.
Dr. Lorrain said that the patient would last only tonight.
Dr. Lorrain left with a decorous smile of self-satisfaction after understanding and stating the patient's condition.
Prince Vasíli opened the door into the princess' room.
The princess' room was almost dark with two tiny lamps burning before icons and a pleasant scent of flowers and burnt pastilles.
The princess' room contained small pieces of furniture, whatnots, cupboards, and little tables.
A quilt of a high, white feather bed was visible behind a screen.
A small dog barked.
The princess asked 'Ah, is it you, cousin?'.
The princess smoothed her hair, which was extremely smooth and seemed made of one piece with her head and covered with varnish.
The princess asked if anything had happened.
The princess said she was terrified.
Prince Vasíli said there was no change and that he only came to have a talk about business with Catiche.
Prince Vasíli said the princess had made the place warm.
Prince Vasíli invited the princess to sit down for a talk.
The princess said she thought perhaps something had happened and sat opposite Prince Vasíli.
The princess said she wished to nap but could not.
Prince Vasíli said 'Well, my dear?' and took her hand, bending it downward.
The princess had a straight rigid body, abnormally long legs, and looked directly at Prince Vasíli with no sign of emotion in her prominent gray eyes.
The princess shook her head and glanced up at the icons with a sigh.
The princess's expression might have been interpreted as sorrow, devotion, weariness, or hope of resting.
Prince Vasíli understood the princess's expression as weariness.
Prince Vasíli asked 'And I?'.
Prince Vasíli said he is as worn out as a post horse but still must have a serious talk with Catiche.
Prince Vasíli's cheeks began to twitch nervously, giving his face an unpleasant expression.
